article_title: World order 'under threat not seen since Cold War'
sentence: It  is  11  months  since  Hamas  attacked  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  another  251  hostage.

article_title: World order 'under threat not seen since Cold War'
sentence: More  than  40,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then  in  Israel's  ongoing  military  campaign,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
